items.name: blink
items.description:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
items.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
items.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

items.name: blades_of_attack
items.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

items.name: broadsword
items.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

items.name: chainmail
items.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

items.name: claymore
items.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

items.name: helm_of_iron_will
items.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

items.name: javelin
items.description:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a 25% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 100 bonus magical damage.
items.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

items.name: mithril_hammer
items.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

items.name: platemail
items.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

items.name: quarterstaff
items.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

items.name: quelling_blade
items.description:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward

Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.

Tree Range: 350
Ward Range: 450

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.
items.notes:
Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
items.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

items.name: ring_of_protection
items.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

items.name: stout_shield
items.description:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 9 damage on ranged.
items.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
items.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

items.name: gauntlets
items.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

items.name: slippers
items.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

items.name: mantle
items.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

items.name: branches
items.description:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Range: 400
items.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

items.name: belt_of_strength
items.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

items.name: boots_of_elves
items.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

items.name: robe
items.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

items.name: circlet
items.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

items.name: ogre_axe
items.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

items.name: blade_of_alacrity
items.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

items.name: staff_of_wizardry
items.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

items.name: ultimate_orb
items.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

items.name: gloves
items.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

items.name: lifesteal
items.description:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.
items.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

items.name: ring_of_regen
items.notes: Ring of Regen is shareable.
items.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

items.name: sobi_mask
items.notes: Sage's Mask is shareable.
items.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

items.name: boots
items.description: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

items.name: gem
items.description:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
items.notes: Disabled while on a courier.
items.lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

items.name: cloak
items.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
items.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

items.name: talisman_of_evasion
items.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
items.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

items.name: magic_stick
items.description:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.

Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
items.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
items.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

items.name: magic_wand
items.description:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.

Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
items.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
items.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

items.name: ghost
items.description:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage.
items.notes:
Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
items.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

items.name: clarity
items.description:
Use: Replenish

Grants 4.5 mana regeneration to the target for 50 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250
items.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

items.name: flask
items.description:
Use: Salve

Grants 50 health regeneration to the target for 8 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250
items.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

items.name: dust
items.description:
Use: Reveal

Reveals and slows invisible heroes by 20% in a 1050 radius around the caster for 12 seconds.
items.notes: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
items.lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

items.name: bottle
items.description:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore 125 health and 75 mana over 2.5 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: 350

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
items.notes:
Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier's movespeed will be slowed by 30%.
items.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

items.name: ward_observer
items.description:
Use: Plant

Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: 500
items.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

items.name: ward_sentry
items.description:
Use: Plant

Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 1000 radius.
Lasts 6 minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: 500
items.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

items.name: tango
items.description:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with 3 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Range: 165
Ward Range: 450
items.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

items.name: courier
items.description:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
items.lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

items.name: tpscroll
items.description:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
items.notes:
If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
Teleport can be prevented or canceled by Root abilities.
items.lore: What a hero truly needs.

items.name: travel_boots
items.description:
Active: Teleport

Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.

Adds 10 seconds to the cooldown of Town Portal Scroll.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

items.name: phase_boots
items.description:
Active: Phase

Gives 22% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

items.name: demon_edge
items.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

items.name: eagle
items.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

items.name: reaver
items.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

items.name: relic
items.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

items.name: hyperstone
items.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

items.name: ring_of_health
items.notes: Ring of Health is shareable.
items.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

items.name: void_stone
items.notes: Void Stone is shareable.
items.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

items.name: mystic_staff
items.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

items.name: energy_booster
items.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

items.name: point_booster
items.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

items.name: vitality_booster
items.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

items.name: power_treads
items.description:
Active: Switch Attribute

Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.notes: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.
items.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

items.name: hand_of_midas
items.description:
Active: Transmute

Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 1.85x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: 600
items.notes:
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
items.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

items.name: oblivion_staff
items.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

items.name: pers
items.notes: Perseverance is shareable.
items.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

items.name: bracer
items.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

items.name: wraith_band
items.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

items.name: null_talisman
items.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

items.name: mekansm
items.description:
Active: Restore

Heals 275 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 1200 radius.

Passive: Mekansm Aura

Grants 3.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.
items.notes:
Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
items.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

items.name: vladmir
items.description:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura

Grants lifesteal (15% for melee heroes, 10% for ranged), 1.5 mana regeneration, 15% bonus attack damage, and 4 armor to nearby allies.

Radius: 1200
items.notes: Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
items.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

items.name: buckler
items.description:
Active: Armor Bonus

Gives +2 armor to all allied units. Lasts 15 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

Radius: 1200
items.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

items.name: ring_of_basilius
items.description:
Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants 0.75 mana regeneration and 2 armor in a 1200 radius.

Toggle: Aura

Deactivate aura to stop affecting non-hero units.
items.notes: Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
items.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

items.name: pipe
items.description:
Active: Barrier

Gives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

Radius: 1200

Passive: Insight Aura

Gives allied units 2 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

Radius: 1200
items.notes:
Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
items.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

items.name: urn_of_shadows
items.description:
Active: Soul Release

Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies.

Lasts 8 seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: 950
items.notes:
Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
items.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

items.name: headdress
items.description:
Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants 2 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200
items.notes: Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
items.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

items.name: sheepstick
items.description:
Active: Hex

Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: 800
items.notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
items.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

items.name: orchid
items.description:
Active: Soul Burn

Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: 900
items.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

items.name: cyclone
items.description:
Active: Cyclone

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Range: 575
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
items.notes:
You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
items.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

items.name: force_staff
items.description:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

Range: 750
items.notes:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
items.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

items.name: dagon
items.description:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: 400
Range: 600
Mana Cost: 120
items.notes: Instantly kills illusions.
items.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

items.name: necronomicon
items.description:
Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: 700
Damage: 75
Mana Break Damage: 30
Last Will Damage: 600

Archer:

Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: 700
Damage: 60
Aura Move Speed: 5
Aura Attack Speed: 5
Aura Radius: 1200
items.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

items.name: ultimate_scepter
items.description:
Passive: Ultimate Upgrade

Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
items.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

items.name: refresher
items.description:
Active: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
items.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

items.name: assault
items.description:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by 5.

Radius: 1200
items.notes: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
items.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

items.name: heart
items.description:
Passive: Health Regeneration

Restores 5% of max health per second.

If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
items.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

items.name: black_king_bar
items.description:
Active: Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration decreases with each use.

Duration: 10
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
items.notes:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
items.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

items.name: shivas_guard
items.description:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

Radius: 900

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by 45.

Radius: 1200
items.notes:
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
items.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

items.name: bloodstone
items.description:
Active: Bloodpact

Converts 30% of your max mana to health regeneration over 2 seconds.

Passive: Mana Battery

Each charge provides 0.3 HP and MP regen. Nearby kills provide 1 charges. Dying causes you to lose 3 charges. Starts with 14 charges.
items.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

items.name: sphere
items.description:
Passive: Spellblock

Blocks most targeted spells once every 13 seconds.

Active: Transfer Spellblock

Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 13 seconds.

Range: 700
items.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

items.name: vanguard
items.description:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
items.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
items.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

items.name: blade_mail
items.description:
Active: Damage Return

For 4.5 seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.
items.notes:
Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blade Mail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
items.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

items.name: soul_booster
items.lore: Regain lost courage.

items.name: hood_of_defiance
items.description:
Active: Barrier

Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage. Lasts 12 seconds.
items.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
items.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

items.name: rapier
items.description:
Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
items.notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
items.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

items.name: monkey_king_bar
items.description:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a 75% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 100 bonus magical damage.
items.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

items.name: radiance
items.description:
Toggle: Burn

When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.

Radius: 700
items.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

items.name: butterfly
items.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
items.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

items.name: greater_crit
items.description:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 235% damage.
items.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
items.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

items.name: basher
items.description:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus magical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
items.notes:
Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar.
items.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

items.name: bfury
items.description:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward

Destroy a target tree or ward.

Tree Cast Range: 350
Ward Cast Range: 450

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.

Passive: Cleave

Deals 60% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. (Melee Only)
items.notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
items.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

items.name: manta
items.description:
Active: Mirror Image

Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds.

Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.

Cooldown increased by 15 seconds on ranged heroes.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
items.notes:
Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
items.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

items.name: lesser_crit
items.description:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a 20% chance to deal 175% damage.
items.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
items.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

items.name: armlet
items.description:
Toggle: Unholy Strength

When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 54 health per second.

You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
items.notes:
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
items.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

items.name: invis_sword
items.description:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.
items.notes:
Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
items.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

items.name: sange_and_yasha
items.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
items.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

items.name: satanic
items.description:
Active: Unholy Rage

Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 5 seconds.

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.
items.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

items.name: mjollnir
items.description:
Active: Static Charge

Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 200 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

Range: 800

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 900 radius, dealing 170 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
items.notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.
Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
items.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

items.name: skadi
items.description:
Passive: Cold Attack

Attacks lower enemy attack speed by %cold_attack_speed% and movement speed by %cold_movement_speed%%.

Lasts %cold_duration_melee% seconds when used by melee heroes, and %cold_duration_ranged% seconds when used by ranged.
items.notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 2.5 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
items.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

items.name: sange
items.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

items.name: helm_of_the_dominator
items.description:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425 and max health to a minimum of 1500.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1500 retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to 200 gold.

Range: 700

Passive: Dominator Aura

Increases nearby allies' attack speed by 20 and health regen by 8.5.

Radius: 1200
items.notes:
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time. If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
items.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

items.name: maelstrom
items.description:
Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 900 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
items.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

items.name: desolator
items.description:
Passive: Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 7 for 15 seconds.
items.notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
items.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

items.name: yasha
items.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
items.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

items.name: mask_of_madness
items.description:
Active: Berserk

Gives 110 attack speed and 30 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you. Lasts 8 seconds.

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for 20% of attack damage dealt.
items.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

items.name: diffusal_blade
items.description:
Active: Inhibit

Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.

Range: 600

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana.

Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.
items.notes: Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
items.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

items.name: ethereal_blade
items.description:
Active: Ether Blast

Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 4 seconds on enemies.

Enemy targets are also slowed by 80%, and take 2x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.

Range: 800
items.notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
items.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

items.name: soul_ring
items.description:
Active: Sacrifice

Consume 170 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
items.notes: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
items.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

items.name: arcane_boots
items.description:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores 160 mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: 1200
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
items.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

items.name: orb_of_venom
items.description:
Passive: Poison Attack

Poisons the target, dealing 5 magical damage per second and slowing movement by 12% if the equipped hero is melee, or 3 magical damage per second and slowing movement by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 3 seconds.
items.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

items.name: ancient_janggo
items.description:
Active: Endurance

Gives +35 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds.

Radius: 1200
items.notes:
Re-purchasing the Drum of Endurance recipe will refresh its charges.
Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
items.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

items.name: medallion_of_courage
items.description:
Active: Valor

If cast on an ally, grants them the 7 armor, and removing it from the caster.

If cast on an enemy, reduces 7 armor on both the enemy and the caster.

Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Range: 1000
items.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

items.name: smoke_of_deceit
items.description:
Use: Disguise

Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds.

Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
items.lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

items.name: veil_of_discord
items.description:
Active: Magic Weakness

Cast a 600 radius blast that decreases enemy magic resistance by 25%.

Range: 1000
Duration: 16 seconds.
items.lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

items.name: rod_of_atos
items.description:
Active: Cripple

Roots the target for 2 seconds.

Range: 1100
items.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

items.name: abyssal_blade
items.description:
Active: Overwhelm

Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds.

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: 140

Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus magical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
items.notes:
The stun is melee range.
Does not stack with other bashes.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
items.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

items.name: heavens_halberd
items.description:
Active: Disarm

Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.

Range: 600
items.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

items.name: tranquil_boots
items.description:
Passive: Break

Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 16 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 18% for 13 seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

items.name: shadow_amulet
items.description:
Active: Fade

Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.

Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving.

There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Range: 600
items.lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

items.name: enchanted_mango
items.description:
Use: Eat Mango

Instantly restores 125 mana.

Range: 400
items.notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
items.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

items.name: lotus_orb
items.description:
Active: Echo Shell

Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

Range: 900
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
items.lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

items.name: solar_crest
items.description:
Active: Shine

When cast on an ally, grants them 12 armor, 80 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 12 armor, 80 attack speed, and 10% movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used.

Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Range: 1000
items.lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

items.name: guardian_greaves
items.description:
Active: Mend

Restores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: 1200
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

Passive: Guardian Aura

Provides nearby allies with 3.5 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
items.lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

items.name: octarine_core
items.description:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

Passive: Spell Lifesteal

25% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced to 5% against creeps.
items.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

items.name: moon_shard
items.description:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants 400 bonus night vision.
items.notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
items.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

items.name: silver_edge
items.description:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage to the target, and for 4 seconds, disable their passive abilities.
items.notes:
Backstab cannot miss.
Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
items.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

items.name: glimmer_cape
items.description:
Active: Glimmer

After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.

Range: 800

Can be cast while channelling.
items.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

items.name: crimson_guard
items.description:
Active: Guard

For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings +2 armor, and a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack.

Units may only be affected by Guard once every 46 seconds.

Radius: 1200

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
items.notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
items.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

items.name: aether_lens
items.description:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 250.
items.notes: Passive does not stack.
items.lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

items.name: dragon_lance
items.description:
Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
items.notes: Passive does not stack.
items.lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

items.name: faerie_fire
items.description:
Use: Imbue

Instantly restores 85 health.
items.lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

items.name: wind_lace
items.description: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
items.lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

items.name: bloodthorn
items.description:
Active: Soul Rend

Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 140% damage.

Range: 900

Passive: Critical Strike

Grants a 20% chance for attacks to inflict 175% damage.
items.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
items.lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

items.name: echo_sabre
items.description:
Passive: Echo Strike

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.
items.lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

items.name: tome_of_knowledge
items.description:
Use: Enlighten

Grants you 700 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team.

Tomes Used By Team: %customval_team_tomes_used%
items.lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

items.name: hurricane_pike
items.description:
Active: Hurricane Thrust

Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: 800
Enemy Range: 400

Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
items.notes:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
items.lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

items.name: blight_stone
items.description:
Passive: Lesser Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 2 for 8 seconds.
items.lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

items.name: infused_raindrop
items.description:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage.

Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
items.notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
items.lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.
